original: Beatrice Frega fled from her family five years ago and went into hiding. Until the night of the murder, many of her friends and family members hadn’t seen or heard from her.\n\nOn the night of the murder, Beatrice finally returned to her home. She arranged a meeting with her father. This meeting didn’t end as planned. And Beatrice angered William Frega enough for him to declare that he would be disinheriting her that night.
translation: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加五年前逃离家族，藏了起来。谋杀当晚之前，她都很久没有联络过朋友和家人。\n\n谋杀发生当晚，比亚特丽丝终于回到了自己家。她与自己的父亲约好会面。但面谈没有按计划结束，比亚特丽丝也惹怒了威廉·弗雷加，后者当晚就宣布剥夺她的继承权。
